Fix the bug of unable to enter the game.

-Now you can find a place to camp and build!

-New weapons and new battle robot. They are all in the camp!

-New levels. Besides, now you can challenge passed levels again and again.

-Adjusted the way to unlock secondary weapons and battle robots.

-Improved the interface of secondary weapons and robots. Now we can know what happened after upgrading them.
We fixed an important bug that prevented some of you from enjoying the game. Thanks for updating!

Camp
-Now you can get the honor badge.

Optimization
-Improved art performance of camp.

-Add more language support.

-Add more sound effect. BGM is coming soon!

-Add more language support.

-Add more sound effect.

-New fashion system. Now you can look different than usual.

- Adding the weapon upgrade system. Even old-school weapons can receive powerful performance enhancements!
- Adding the difficult mode for levels. Only the masters among the masters can challenge. Strengthen your performance through challenges!
- Adding the in-session item system. Request help during an emergency to enhance your capacity.
- Adding camp defense events. Defend your homeland and receive a wealth of precious trophies.
- Adding many entertainment facilities in the camp. Rescued survivors will have things to do, instead of nervously pacing around.
- Adding magazines on the main UI, where we can reminisce about past adventures.

- Added instructions for all the main and secondary weapons, as well as for robots. We can understand the weapons at hand more.
- Talent levels have different performance grades. Skill development is clear. In the meantime, you will be able to upgrade directly by consuming resources and won't have to be annoyed that the talent you want can't get upgraded.
- Optimizing talent system UI performance.
- Optimizing the artistic performance of some features.

- Fixing the bug that the Death Robots occasionally don't return to the main character.

-More challenges. We added more interesting challenges. Test your survival skills!

-More main weapons and skills. From now on, you'll receive your own special skills after stepping up all the main weapons!

-More transformation of secondary weapons. Dr. Strange's mechanical arms can help you transform all of your owned secondary weapons.

-From now on, please pay attention to your trash can. Trash cans in every boss levels may contain rare resources. Do check it out for treasures.

-Fireworks have been launched in camps. You can set off fireworks in camps. Let's enjoy!"

-Unlock a Level 5 challenge: Final Boss's Residence.
-Added weapon integration system with greatly enhanced weapon skills and tactics combination.
-You can bring 6 robots to fight with you in difficult levels. These reliable partners can help you overcome hardships!
-Secondary weapon modifications will be available for trial. We can provide advance experience of the effects of secondary weapons modification!
-Weapon optimization upgrading method.
- Bug fix and improvements.

-Before the start of the camp defense battle, we will have 1 minute to prepare for the battle.
-Optimize the weapon name, the weapon name shall suit the weapon's characteristics better.
-The badge of honor in the camp is not only a symbol of honor, the guards of the camp will become more and more motivated, and get more gold coins for everyone!
-Mushroom Landmine and Frozen Grenade can be tried once, survivors who have not experienced it yet, hurry up and try it.
